comments:
Eclipse 3.2 for OS_ARCH=x86_64 and GTK2+
OS = Ubuntu 6.06 Desktop (64-bit)

java version "1.5.0_07"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.5.0_07-b03)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 1.5.0_07-b03, mixed mode)

Problem:

SWT web browser component is crashing with UnsatisfiedLinkError as mentioned in steps to reproduce section below. In my application I have used swt browser components very widely, also it is used in welcome page as well. Because of this one of product is crashing at launch time and other product dont show any details of view in which browser component is embedded. Things are working fine on other Linux platforms but it is failing on Linux x86_64.

Steps to reproduce: 

In Eclipse 
1) Select Windows->Show View->Other to open Show View dialog
2) Select General->Internal Web Browser

In internal web browser view it shows message "Embedded browser not available". On Clicking "Details" button it shows following exception:

No more handles (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no swt-mozilla-gtk-3232 in java.library.path)
org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: No more handles (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no swt-mozilla-gtk-3232 in java.library.path)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3400)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3297)
	at org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser.<init>(Browser.java:166)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.browser.BrowserViewer.<init>(BrowserViewer.java:224)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.browser.WebBrowserView.createPartControl(WebBrowserView.java:48)
       :
Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: no swt-mozilla-gtk-3232 in java.library.path
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1682)
	at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:822)
	at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:992)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.Library.loadLibrary(Library.java:123)
	at org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser.<init>(Browser.java:151)
	... 37 more

So I looked for libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so file in configuration folder but I could not found it. Downloaded swt packs of standalone swt application for linux(32-bit) and Linux(64-bit). Observed that libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so file does not exists in Linux(64-bit) zip but present in Linux(32-bit) zip. Coppied 32-bit libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so fole to "/home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/" folder where I found other relavent .so files. Restarted eclipse and this time following exception shown in Browser View.

No more handles (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: /home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so: /home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: No more handles (java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: /home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so: /home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3400)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3297)
	at org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser.<init>(Browser.java:166)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.browser.BrowserViewer.<init>(BrowserViewer.java:224)
        :
Caused by: java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: /home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so: /home/exceed/IDEs/eclipse/configuration/org.eclipse.osgi/bundles/79/1/.cp/libswt-mozilla-gtk-3232.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
	at java.lang.ClassLoader$NativeLibrary.load(Native Method)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary0(ClassLoader.java:1751)
	at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadLibrary(ClassLoader.java:1676)
	at java.lang.Runtime.loadLibrary0(Runtime.java:822)
	at java.lang.System.loadLibrary(System.java:992)
	at org.eclipse.swt.internal.Library.loadLibrary(Library.java:123)
	at org.eclipse.swt.browser.Browser.<init>(Browser.java:151)
	... 42 more
